channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Tariff Pause
item.description: Congress should use the opportunity to end the president’s bogus emergency declarations and retake its tariff powers.

item.title: Mike Johnson punts House vote on Trump tax agenda after GOP rebellion threatened defeat
item.description: House GOP leaders have been pressing holdouts hard ahead of a key vote on Trump's agenda.

item.title: Trump-backed bill to stop 'rogue' judges passes House
item.description: House lawmakers advanced a bill to block district judges from issuing nationwide injunctions in most cases.

item.title: Trump targets more law firms

item.title: 5 Common Lies About The SAVE Act — And How To Refute Them
item.description: These lies are purposely designed to guilt Americans into sacrificing their right to free and fair elections.

item.title: Florida Gators Won March Madness But Lost Their Iconic Cheer To The Woke Mob
item.description: The University of Florida, succumbing to perpetually victimized leftists, banned part of its iconic cheer in 2020 due to allegations of racism.

item.title: The Key to Political Dominance Is Glaringly Obvious — and Being Ignored Again
item.description: With Trump’s trade war, the siren’s call of revolution proved too seductive, once more.

item.description: The progressive hero created the predicate for the Trump presidency.

item.description: President Trump is aiming to modernize the Department of Defense by improving the procurement process and weapons sales to U.S. allies.
